member.name: T:Atom.Scene.QuadTree2
member.summary: This class reprents a 'loose' 2-D Quad Tree which supports moving objects.
member.remarks:
A Quad Tree is one methods to divide a plane (the 2dim space) into sub-parts: The tree iteself is the root node. This node is divided into four quads of same size - the leaves of the first division. Those leaves can also again each be devided into sub-leaves; this happens until the set division level is reached. Objects are stored in 'End Leaves'. Those are the leaves which aren't subdivided.
